actions.text: Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 2521. All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived. The conference report shall be considered as having been read when called up for consideration.
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 102-332, by Mr. Moakley.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 80.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 359 - 59 (Roll no. 408).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Waiving all points of order against the conference report on the bill (H.R. 2521) making appropriations for the Department of Defense for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1992, and for other purposes, and against consideration of such conference report.

summary.text: Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 2521 (armed forces funding).

titles.title: Waiving all points of order against the conference report on the bill (H.R. 2521) making appropriations for the Department of Defense for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1992, and for other purposes, and against consideration of such conference report.
